file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  title: "Simple Items API"
  description: "Simple items CRUD for demo"
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /item/{id}:
    get:
      summary: "Get an by id"
      tags:
        - Operations
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Item"
    delete:
      summary: "Delete an item by id"
      tags:
        - Operations
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Changed"
    put:
      summary: "Update an item"
      tags:
        - Operations
      parameters:
        - name: "id"
          in: "path"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Item"
  /item/:
    post:
      summary: "Create an item"
      tags:
        - Operations
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Item"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Changed"
  /items/:
    get:
      summary: "Get a list of items"
      tags:
        - Operations
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "200 response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Results"
components:
  schemas:
    Item:
      type: "object"
      required:
        - "name"
        - "description"
        - "labels"
      properties:
        id:
          type: "string"
          description: "The id of the item"
          format: "byte"
          readOnly: true
        name:
          type: "string"
          description: "The item name"
          pattern: '^[A-Za-z0-9\-\_]+$'
        description:
          type: "string"
          description: "Description of the item"
          minLength: 5
          maxLength: 250
        creationDt:
          type: "string"
          description: "Creation date of the item"
          format: "date-time"
        active:
          type: "boolean"
          description: "Is item active?"
          nullable: true
        labels:
          type: "array"
          uniqueItems: true
          items:
            type: "string"
            enum:
              - "used"
              - "new"
              - "like new"
              - "broken"
              - "lightly used"
        rating:
          type: number
          minimum: 0
          maximum: 5
          exclusiveMinimum: true
        price:
          type: integer
          multipleOf: 5
        stores:
          type: "array"
          description: "Associated stores"
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Store"
    Store:
      type: "object"
      description: "A store"
      required:
        - "name"
        - "id"
      properties:
        id:
          type: "string"
          description: "The id of the item"
          format: "byte"
        name:
          type: "string"
          description: "The item name"
          pattern: '^[A-Za-z0-9\s]+$'
        about:
          type: "string"
          maxLength: 250
    Results:
      type: "array"
      description: "Collection of items"
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Item"
    Changed:
      required:
        - "id"
      type: "object"
      properties:
        id:
          type: "string"
          description: "The id of the resource"
      description: "Response for successful transfer creation/deletion/update"
